summary: The customer was interested in learning more about Contoso Wireless’ upgrade services. The agent provided information about the phone upgrade plan, which offers customers a 20% discount when they upgrade their phones every two years. The agent also discussed the accessories offered and the 10% discount for purchasing multiple items at once. Additionally, the agent informed the customer about the 24/7 customer support line, online troubleshooting resources, and loyalty rewards program. Finally, the agent provided instructions on how to start the upgrade process.
